item.title: There are many bins left there., 16th February
item.description:
The bins have not been collected for over a month. Additional bins have now been left there, and the area has effectively become a dumping site.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Westhorne Avenue, Eltham

item.title: Traffic light facing the wrong way, 16th February
item.description:
The traffic light head for Buckingham Palace Road southbound at the Elizabeth Street junction is facing the wrong way - the signal is facing the pedestrians looking to cross the road. This is potentially dangerous as pedestrians might interpret this as the Green pedestrian light when itâ€™s actually the Green longer for traffic.

Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - pole leaning / equipment detached from pole/facing the wrong direction

item.title: SORN car with no MOT dumped on public estate, 16th February
item.description:
Photos taken 15th February 2026. Car is parked (badly) on the Barnfield Estate by the Mayplace Lane to Herbert Road footpath. Barnfield is riddled with abandoned cars taking space for residents who need to use these parking spots.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Herbert Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Emergency- toilets not open, 16th February
item.description:
Hi We have tennis camps with young children attending and the toilets have not been opened. Can you please let me know that they will be opened by tommorow morning. have tried to cal idverde but cant get through, My tel is 07855 451941 email. matt.borthwick@theparklangleyclub.co.uk Many thanks Matt
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Village Way, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Give way lines have eroded, 16th February
item.description:
The give way lines at the junction of Newton Road and Faraday Road have eroded, cars just pull out without stopping making it extremely dangerous especially so as we have a primary school located 100 yards away from the junction

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newton Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
